text: e II     In stage II, cancer is found in two areas (of either the nasal cavity or the ethmoid sinus) that are near each other or has spread to an area next to the sinuses. Cancer may also have spread into bone.       Stage III     In stage III, cancer has spread to any of the following:            - The eye socket.     - The maxillary sinus.     - The roof of the mouth.     - The bone between the eyes.            or      Cancer has spread to one lymph node on the same side of the neck as the can
